attachments.title: Serial: The Syed family on their pain and the ‘five million detectives trying to work out if Adnan is a psychopath’
attachments.text: The podcast exploring the case of Adnan Syed, who was convicted of the 1999 murder of his ex-girlfriend Hae Min Lee, has become a global phenomenon. In an exclusive interview, Adnan’s family talk to Jon Ronson about listening to Serial, toxic Reddit threads and how his imprisonment has destroyed their lives
attachments.fallback: the Guardian: Serial: The Syed family on their pain and the ‘five million detectives trying to work out if Adnan is a psychopath’
